author: Igor Traskovetskyi

changelog.release_notes: - Optimized weather images on Pebble Time 2.
- Now available on Pebble Time 2.
- Optimization for Pebble Time 2.
- Yahoo Weather fix after API changed.
- Yahoo Weather is back!
- Quick fix while Yahoo Weather having problems on their side (used only OpenWeatherMap server for now).

- Added possibility to change order of lowest and highest temperature in forecast;
- Style optimization.
- Added support for the Pebble Round.
- Fix after OpenWeatherMap api update.
Fix for update of the date.
- Added possibility to set position of the information at the bottom.
- Memory leak resolved, forecast became stable also on the Pebble Original.
- Fix for month localization.
- Fix for date displaying on some watches.
- Optimized bluetooth icon;
- Forecast turned off for Pebble Original by default 'cause of a lot of crashes.
Added option that allows hide leading zero in hours.
Optimized requests to weather servers.

latest_release.release_notes: - Optimized weather images on Pebble Time 2.

title: Sketchy Weather
